channel.title: CVE Feed for Medtronic -- Minimed 600 Series Insulin Pump
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Medtronic -- Minimed 600 Series Insulin Pump

item.title: CVE-2022-32537|2024-08-03T07:46:43.499Z -- medtronic -- minimed%20600%20series%20insulin%20pump
item.description: A vulnerability exists which could allow an unauthorized user to learn aspects of the communication protocol used to pair system components while the pump is being paired with other system components. Exploitation requires nearby wireless signal proximity with the patient and the device; advanced technical knowledge is required for exploitation. Please refer to the Medtronic Product Security Bulletin for guidance
